name: Ogremon
effect: [When Attacking] You may trash 1 card in your hand to have this Digimon gain ＜Security Attack +1＞ for the turn. (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.)
digivolve_effect: [When Attacking] You may trash 1 card in your hand to have this Digimon get +2000 DP for the turn.
